sentences.en: Anoint Aaron and his sons and consecrate them so they may serve me as priests.
sentences.cn: 要膏亚伦和他的儿子,使他们成为圣,可以给我供祭司的职分.

sentences.en: Anoint the basin and its stand and consecrate them.
sentences.cn: 11要抹洗濯盆和盆座,使盆成圣.

sentences.en: At the timeadmittedthe medical profession, I solemnly pledge myself to consecrate the service of humanity.
sentences.cn: 值此就医生职业之际, 我庄严宣誓为服务于人类而献身.

sentences.en: But in a large sense we cannot dedicate, we can't consecrate, we can't hallow this ground.
sentences.cn: 但是,从更广泛的意义上说,这块土地我们不能够奉献, 不能够圣化, 不能够神化.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate - we can not 6 consecrate hallow - this ground.
sentences.cn: 可是, 从更广的意义上说, 我们并不能奉献这块土地 - 们不能使之神圣-们也不能使之光荣.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate - we can not consecrate - we can not hallow - this ground.
sentences.cn: 然, 于更广阔之意义上, 吾辈无从题献 — 无从圣化 — 无从顶礼斯土.

sentences.en: Consecrate them in the truth. Your word is truth.
sentences.cn: 求你以真理祝圣他们, 你的话就是真理.

sentences.en: Consecrate your life to the church.
sentences.cn: 把你的生命奉献给教堂吧.

sentences.en: Consecrate yourselves and be holy, because I am the LORD your God.
sentences.cn: 所以你们要自洁成圣 、 因为我是耶和华你们的神.

sentences.en: God Our Father, we consecrate to you the World Youth Day in Sydney in 2008.
sentences.cn: 天父, 求你圣化2008年在悉尼举办的普世青年节.

sentences.en: He poured some of the anointing oil on Aaron's head and anointed him to consecrate him.
sentences.cn: 又把膏油倒在亚伦的头上膏他、使他成圣.

sentences.en: No one has the right to consecrate another's sacred word regardless of his own belief system.
sentences.cn: 任何人都无权奉献他人的神圣的字眼,无论他自己的信仰体系.

sentences.en: She helped the maidens prepare and consecrate their lives during their periods of expectancy.
sentences.cn: 她帮助少女在期待的时期准备和奉献她们生命.

sentences.en: The bones will be reburied in consecrated ground .
sentences.cn: 尸骨将被重新安葬在圣地里。

sentences.en: The priest promised God he would consecrate his life to helping the poor.
sentences.cn: 牧师对上帝允诺他将献身帮助穷人.

sentences.en: What experience does is merely to confirm and consecrate our confident dream.
sentences.cn: 经验之作用无非在于把我们充满自信心的梦境肯定下来,奉为神圣不可侵犯而已.

words.tran_cn: 奉献（consecrate的过去分词）；使…神圣；供神用
奉献；使神圣；供神用；献身于

trans.tran_cn: 把…奉为神圣，给…祝圣，奉献，献祭，使就圣职，举行圣体礼使
